com.isotrol.impe3.core.engine
Class DefaultEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.isotrol.impe3.core.engine.DefaultEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Engine
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultOfflineEngine, DefaultOnlineEngine
public abstract class DefaultEngine
extends Object
implements Engine

Default engine implementation. This engine provides a per-request implementation so IT IS NOT THREAD-SAFE.
